data.instruction: Configure one external integration/channel and verify sync state + external id linkage is persisted.
data.expectedResult: Connector installation/configuration and sync status are queryable for operational debugging.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Pre-Appointment Checklist (Task Completion Tracking). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Custom Fields (Flexible Data Capture). Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.

error.message: You are not a member of this biz.
